main_menu.default: LOAVES AND FISHES - The Greatest Story Ever Played
main_menu.christian_edition: Loaves and Fishes - An Interactive Biblical Journey

continue.default: CONTINUE - Pick Up Where You Left Off

quest_accepted.default: Quest accepted! Time to get to work! Check your quest log!
quest_accepted.christian_edition: Quest accepted. Check your quest log for details.

quest_declined.default: Quest declined. Maybe later? They'll still be here!
quest_declined.christian_edition: Quest declined. You can accept it later if you change your mind.

quest_completed.default: Quest COMPLETED! Nice work! Rewards claimed!
quest_completed.christian_edition: Quest completed successfully. Rewards have been received.

continue_prompt.default: Press ANY KEY to continue... Hello? Anyone there?

farewell.default: Peace out! May the fish be with you!
farewell.christian_edition: Farewell. May peace be with you.

welcome.default: Welcome to LOAVES AND FISHES! This is a BIBLICAL RPG about Jesus, fish, and miracles! Let's get started!
welcome.christian_edition: Welcome to Loaves and Fishes. This game tells the story of Jesus's ministry through an interactive adventure.

movement.default: Use ARROW KEYS to move around. Pretty standard stuff! Go explore!
movement.christian_edition: Use the arrow keys to move your character around the world.

battles.default: Battles are TURN-BASED! Pick your fish, pick your move, watch them FIGHT! Easy!
battles.christian_edition: Battles are turn-based. Choose your fish and select an attack each turn.

fishing.default: Press SPACE to FISH! Catch fish, use them in battle! Build your aquatic army!
fishing.christian_edition: Press the spacebar to fish in designated fishing spots. You can use caught fish in battles.

miracles.default: Fill the MIRACLE METER to use JESUS'S SPECIAL ABILITIES! Ultimate moves! Very powerful!
miracles.christian_edition: Fill the Miracle Meter through battles to use Jesus's special miracle abilities.

greeting.default: Welcome! Looking to BUY or SELL? We've got fish and bread! The essentials!
greeting.christian_edition: Welcome, traveler. Are you here to buy or sell?

not_enough_money.default: You're BROKE! Not enough denarii! Go earn some more!
not_enough_money.christian_edition: You do not have enough denarii for this purchase.

inventory_full.default: Inventory is FULL! You can't carry any more! Sell something first!
inventory_full.christian_edition: Your inventory is full. Please make room before purchasing.

farewell.default: Thanks for shopping! Come back anytime! We'll be here!
farewell.christian_edition: Thank you for your business. Come again.

greeting.default: Welcome to the INN! Rest up! Your fish look EXHAUSTED!
greeting.christian_edition: Welcome to the inn. Would you like to rest and heal your fish?

rest_prompt.default: Rest here for {price} denarii? All fish FULLY HEALED! Best deal ever!
rest_prompt.christian_edition: Would you like to rest here for {price} denarii? All fish will be fully healed.

rest_success.default: Good morning! You and your fish are FULLY RESTED! Ready to go!
rest_success.christian_edition: You are well rested. Your fish have been fully healed.

rest_declined.default: Maybe later? The beds will still be here! We're always open!
rest_declined.christian_edition: Very well. Return when you need rest.

hello.default: Hey there! How's it going? Nice day for fishing, isn't it?
hello.christian_edition: Greetings, traveler. How may I help you?

goodbye.default: See ya! Safe travels! Watch out for bandits!
goodbye.christian_edition: Farewell. May your journey be safe.

no_more_dialogue.default: I've got nothing else to say! Already told you everything!
no_more_dialogue.christian_edition: I have nothing more to share at this time.

file_not_found.default: ERROR: File not found! Uh oh! Something's missing!
file_not_found.christian_edition: Error: File not found. Please check the game files.

corrupted_save.default: ERROR: Save file is CORRUPTED! Oh no! Start a new game?
corrupted_save.christian_edition: Error: Save file is corrupted. Please start a new game.

unknown_error.default: ERROR: Something went wrong! We don't know what! Sorry!
unknown_error.christian_edition: An unknown error has occurred. Please restart the game.

metadata.description: All UI strings and menu text with dual-text support
